name: Suspicious PowerShell Download
false_positives: PowerShell scripts that download content from the Internet
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(powershell.file.script_block_text:*System.Net.WebClient* AND powershell.file.script_block_text:(*.DownloadFile\(* OR *.DownloadString\(*))`
